channel.title: Posts on F. Cheng's Talk
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on F. Cheng's Talk

item.title: Fast data transfer/sync using globus
item.description: About Globus Globus is a secure, reliable research data management service. It works as a bridge between the remote Endpoint and the local Endpoint, rather than the cloud. With Globus, subscribers can move, share, publish & discover data via a single interface – whether your files live on a supercomputer, lab cluster, tape archive, public cloud or your laptop, you can manage this data from anywhere, using your existing identities, via just a web browser.

item.title: Run Unix executable binary on MATLAB
item.description: As a MATLAB guy and *nix guy, you may want to fulfill everything on MATLAB, or on command line. I will choose the former one. Call SYSTEM command in MATLAB MATLAB has its own bssh PATH, which is different from the *nix PATH. But a workaround consists in modifying the script (/Applications/MATLAB_R*****.app/bin/matlab) that launches MATLAB. $ cd /Applications/MATLAB_R*****.app/bin/ $ vi matlab # add the following line after #!/bin/sh $ export PATH:$PATH Then, add this matlab into your ~/.

item.title: modify citation style in mendeley
item.description: 作为文献管理工具，Mendeley可以说深得民心。当然，国内用户可能会对其不稳定的服务器不爽，但是不算是影响生产力的问题。唯一让我崩溃的一件

item.title: Free license for beyond compare MAC/Win/Linux
item.description: Thanks HUQI’s share! check the lic file 'huqi/trial.key' from above link Take MAC for example: download beyond compare package install replace trial.key under /Applications/Beyond\ Compare.app/Contents/Resources/trial.key with above license save trial.key & restart app Usage: install command line tool e.g., $ bcompare new.f90 old.f90 $ bcompare /Folder1/ /Folder2/ install Beyond Compare plugin on sublime text Notes: Refer the comments on huqi’s Githu for more info This license works for 4.

item.title: how to run MPI programs?

item.title: unblock Neteasemusic for Overseas Chinese
item.description: location: USA OS: macOS\iphone\ipad Update: Nov 20, 2017 1. modify hosts for MAC/PC Just like the means to unblock google within the GreatWALL, we could modify the hosts for Neteasemusic by adding the following IP addresses into hosts file. # 网易云音乐数据传输服务器反代 79.137.38.20 music.163.com # 归属地查询服务器反代 79.137.38.20 ip.ws.126.net #

item.title: About FFT in MATLAB

item.title: plot China map & inside world map with GMT
